snippet: As “Riverdance” and the like have popularized Irish dance, youth competitions have become a more widespread, and more rigorous, subculture.
abstract: Competition circuit for Irish dancing has grown to include dancers of all ethnic backgrounds in two decades since show Riverdance first brought style to global audience.
lead_paragraph: As “Riverdance” and the like have popularized Irish dance, youth competitions have become a more widespread, and more rigorous, subculture.

headline.main: The Jig Is Up, if You’re Irish or Not
headline.print_headline: The Jig Is Up, if You’re Irish or Not
